io.micronaut.http.server.context

Class ServerRequestContextFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.http.server.context.ServerRequestContextFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Ordered, HttpFilter, HttpServerFilter

    @Filter(value="/**")
 @Internal
public final class ServerRequestContextFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements HttpServerFilter
    A filter that instruments the request with the ServerRequestContext.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    graemerocher
